channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Multiple pot holes each side of road, 31st January
item.description:
Just after speed bump before bridge in Churchdown lane
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown Lane, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Straggly branches, 31st January
item.description:
As you come to the trees on the park, the strangely branches need trimming back to trunk. Otherwise vehicles scrape alongside them You can also see where vehicles avoid them due to the debris being pushed to sign. It also means that you are having to alter your road position to accommodate missing these branches The picture supplied is from Google it has had lower main branches removed , this is the now to deal with the young regrowth shoots/branches

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Meadowleaze, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree has fallen down in the storms, 30th January
item.description:
Horsbere brook down the path from Cheltenham road by Penny Close, a tree has come down in the storm, the tree trunk is across the to of the brook and the branches that were cut to clear the path are piled by the brook. Just need clearing away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porter Close, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees that have been cut back by the horsbere brook obstructing the waterflow., 30th January
item.description:
Horsbere brook, just off the Cheltenham road, on the path that runs along side the brook. The trees have had a large number of large branches cut from them and are across the brook causing an obstruction across the brook. If we have heavy rain again these large branches could get washed down the broom causing obstruction along the brook.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road, Longlevens, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Verge has become so eroded through people parking on it that the Gigaclear cable is now exposed and vulnerable to damage., 30th January

Verge on eastern side of Coberley School, close to the large sign that names the school.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Main Street, Coberley, Cotswold

item.title: Pot hole several inches deep, 30th January
item.description:
Approximately in front of number 11 Green Street In the middle of the road It's deep enough and large enough that it will cause damage to any vehicle which drives over it. Seems to be getting worse by the day as the sides of the hole crumble due to traffic driving over it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge pothole at left edge of road direction cleeve to gotherington. The steering wheel of my car nearly flew out of my hands. Very dangerous one!!!, 30th January
item.description:
On the country lane between the junction of the co op and the first house in Gotherington on gotherington lane. It has s VERY deep and threw the car.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury

item.title: Continual flooding of section of B4634 close to the Staverton bridge crossroads, 30th January
item.description:
B4634 near the Staverton bridge crossroads. Continually flooded for the last two months. Dangerous due to irresponsible drivers driving too fast through the flooding.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
